recommendations.title: Streamline Checkout Form
recommendations.description: Reduce form fields from 10 to 7 by removing non-essential information while ensuring essential data is still collected.
recommendations.expected_impact: Decrease user abandonment rate during checkout by 10% due to reduced complexity.
recommendations.justification: Users reported frustration with too many form fields, leading to confusion and lengthy process.

before_after.before: Checkout form has 10 fields, causing user confusion and frustration.
before_after.after: Checkout form now has 7 streamlined fields, making it easier for users to complete.

issues.description: Reducing form fields may impact accessibility for users who rely on certain information to complete the checkout process.
issues.suggested_fix: Consider providing alternative methods for users to input essential information if fields are removed.

recommendations.title: Optimize Mobile Menu Functionality
recommendations.description: Improve mobile menu responsiveness and functionality to ensure smooth navigation and access to all sections.
recommendations.expected_impact: Reduce mobile user frustration and increase engagement by 20% through improved navigation.
recommendations.justification: Mobile users reported issues with menu functionality, hindering their browsing experience.

before_after.before: Mobile menu with limited functionality and navigation issues.
before_after.after: Optimized mobile menu that provides seamless navigation and access to all sections.

issues.description: The recommendation does not specify if the optimized mobile menu design aligns with the existing design system.
issues.suggested_fix: Ensure that the optimized mobile menu design follows the established design system to maintain consistency.

recommendations.title: Prominent Submit Button
recommendations.description: Increase size and contrast of the submit button by 30% to make it more noticeable and accessible.
recommendations.expected_impact: Increase completion rate by 10% as users can easily locate and interact with the submit button.
recommendations.justification: Users reported difficulty in finding the submit button, leading to checkout abandonment.

before_after.before: Small, inconspicuous submit button at the bottom of the form.
before_after.after: Larger, more prominent submit button that stands out for users to click.

implementation_notes: Ensure thorough testing on both desktop and mobile devices to validate the effectiveness of the design changes.
general_observations: The checkout page has potential for significant improvement by addressing key user pain points and enhancing overall usability.
